message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. It's a good offer, considering the money will be worth less next round.
Alice, your offer was unfair. I'm willing to be reasonable, so let's split it 60/40. This is my final offer.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share. I'm proposing $65 for me and $35 for you.  This is a better deal for you than waiting for another round.
Alice, the clock is ticking and we're both losing out. Let's settle this now. 55/45 is my final offer.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns, but I'm offering a bit more to be fair. $60 for me, $40 for you.  Let's wrap this up before the money loses even more value for you!
